snippet: A top intelligence chief responds to remarks made by President Obama in an interview with The Atlantic magazine.
abstract: Turki al-Faisal, Saudi prince and former ambassador to United States and Britain, publishes open letter rebutting Pres Obama's characterization of Middle Eastern governments as 'free riders' on US international policy; defends Saudi Arabia's past actions.

byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: A top intelligence chief responds to remarks made by President Obama in an interview with The Atlantic magazine.

headline.main: Saudis Issue a Response to Criticism by Obama
headline.print_headline: Saudis Issue a Response to Criticism by Obama

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
